books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The Lord of the Rings is an epic high-fantasy novel written by English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The Hobbit, or There and Back Again is a children's fantasy novel by English author J. R. R. Tolkien.

books.title: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The Fellowship of the Ring is the first of three volumes of the epic novel The Lord of the Rings by the English author J. R. R. Tolkien.

books.title: The Two Towers
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The Two Towers is the second volume of J. R. R. Tolkien's high fantasy novel The Lord of the Rings.

books.title: The Return of the King
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The Return of the King is the third and final volume of J. R. R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, following The Fellowship of the Ring and The Two Towers.
